participant_abstract.sent: This was where our design ideas began to take a more specific shape.
We discussed energy source options, case material options, ergonomic options, innovative interfaces, and current design trends.
From the perspective of my role, the meeting was important for determining whether we were going to create a niche remote or a more general, elegant remote.

participant_actions.sent: Rik is talking to the bosses and responding to mails.
Catherine and I are playing with play-dough.

participant_decisions.sent: Decided to use battery and dynamo for power.
Decided to use rubber for case and button materials.
Decided the remote would be double-curved for ergonomic reasons.
We might incorporate fruit and vegetables.

participant_problems.sent: Reissa really wants something like blue-tooth but the others aren't interested.
We originally wanted a more general remote and all agreed on that, but it is now becoming a sort of gimmicky remote.
